lines.text: [after exiting the car by throwing her legs over the side while wearing a short skirt and no panties, stunning the gas station attendant]
What's the matter, honey? Never seen a convertible before?
No Ma'am. I mean, yes Ma'am. But, I mean, I... I ain't never seen one of *those* before.
Now, you gentlemen better get outta here. Dontcha know you're trespassin'?
